Name: Theryon, Magister of Justice
Functional Text: The first time each turn another hero destroys a card they don’t control, you may pay {r}{r}. If you do, they destroy a non-hero permanent they control.

Name: Gavel of Natural Order
Functional Text:
**Pairs** with an off-hand

**Once per Turn Action** - {r}{r}: **Attack**

Whenever an opponent plays or activates their first card or ability each turn, if it's not their turn, put a +1{p} counter on this. At the beginning of your end phase, remove all +1{p} counters from this.

Name: Proclamation of Abundance

Name: Bellona, Archangel of War
Functional Text:
**Once per Turn Action – {r}{r}: Attack**

When Bellona attacks, you may banish a card from your hero’s soul. If you do, put a +1{a} counter on each angel you control.
